Stats show the fees for LTC is comparable to BCH: https://bitinfocharts.com/comparison/transactionfees-bch-ltc.html#3m … Since neither have full blocks, fees are determined by code constants. Bitcoin Cash would never activate SegWit. I believe it only exists because miners wanted an alternative sha256d coin that doesn't have SegWit so that they can continue to use Asicboost.
Cash is not 8x because it doesn't have SegWit. Bitcoin Cash is more like Bitcoin/2.
